summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Executive Department - Office of Policy Planning ; authorizing a memorandum of understanding with Seattle School District No. 1 to provide for a joint study under a grant contract with the National Institute of Education; conditionally increasing Object of Expenditure "1000 - Personal Services" in Program Category "Policy Development " (code 6200) in the 1975 Budget of the Executive Department in connection therewith, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
